column5: Anyone have any info on Fairy lake? Drove by it today and caught my interest. Thanks.
I assume you mean the one in Acton? It has bass, pike, crappie, carp and panfish in it.
Fished it last year twice. Targeting bass both times, put in full days. Not much luck with anything over 2 pounds.

I have always found it to be so full of weeds it was almost not worth fishing from a canoe. That being said, I have caught both bass and pike in there (on the small side). Not worth it IMO, lots of better options in that area.

Yes I agree, not worth it.  It can be a fun lake, granted most fish are the smallish side there are some decent fish to be had. My advice is to try one evening if its not too far a drive and fish topwater, it will keep you busy for a few hrs.
I appreciate all the info you all. Thanks.
